name: Expo Rules
description: Rules for using Expo in the project

rules.name: Use Expo Components
rules.description: Prioritize using Expo components when possible
rules.message: Check if Expo provides a similar component (e.g., expo-av instead of react-native-video)

rules.name: Expo SDK Version
rules.description: Check the Expo SDK version being used
rules.message: Ensure you are using the latest stable Expo SDK version

rules.name: Expo Constants Usage
rules.description: Use expo-constants to access configuration information
rules.message: Use expo-constants to access application configuration information

rules.name: Expo Router Navigation
rules.description: Prefer using Expo Router for navigation
rules.message: Consider using expo-router instead of react-navigation for file-based routing

rules.name: Expo Splash Screen
rules.description: Use expo-splash-screen to manage the splash screen
rules.message: Use expo-splash-screen to manage your application's splash screen

rules.name: Expo Updates
rules.message: Use expo-updates to support Over-The-Air updates

rules.name: App Config Structure
rules.message: Ensure app.config.ts structure follows Expo's configuration structure

rules.name: Expo Vector Icons
rules.message: Use @expo/vector-icons for icons in Expo projects

rules.name: Expo Status Bar
rules.description: Use expo-status-bar instead of StatusBar from react-native
rules.message: Use expo-status-bar instead of StatusBar from react-native

rules.name: Expo Notifications
rules.message: Use expo-notifications instead of other libraries for push notifications

rules.name: Expo Dev Client
rules.message: Use expo-dev-client for development builds with Expo

rules.name: Expo English Comments
rules.description: Expo-related comments must be in English
rules.message: Expo-related comments must be written in English

rules.name: Base Component Documentation
rules.description: Base components should have JSDoc documentation
rules.message: Base components should have JSDoc documentation explaining their purpose and props
